Lines.dc157363-d9fa-70f5-29fe-f40825f14847: We can search for more later. But in the meantime, our differing forms are still problematic.
Lines.2e50c8c5-f703-40a0-87eb-7a075b0b32b8: Your future has been rewritten - the path ahead obscured by uncertainty.
Lines.d6ab1f91-c0ed-fc92-cbd7-65ac319eb90f: Karlach... I wish I could. Unfortunately, it is not as simple as a matter of want.
Lines.b414c6c0-32ea-cb4b-2ebf-9e3df5d72074: Sorry... I didn't mean to upset you. I was just... reflecting.
Lines.b0384390-9655-e997-c061-f31c0a6a29ac: So am I. Though even if they did... your illithidness would more than suffice.
Lines.ae7b07ac-6898-d6a1-f494-3429a5b3d077: However, I fear that it will not be safe for you. Illithids working with willing humanoids is rare enough, but to be so tightly linked that our minds intertwine...
Lines.ab6a40fb-1e6a-85cc-e846-0690bc1a18fa: I took this from the nautiloid and have nurtured it since, priming it for your use if you ever desired to evolve.
Lines.a8d5b214-2345-be9b-aee2-195dc07bf05c: I had hoped for a miracle. In my centuries as an illithid, you are the only person who has truly cared for me. I don't want to see you burn away.
Lines.beb98a01-fac8-f531-e17c-7ce092cf3891: Please... return to Avernus. You deserve a life.
Lines.a5299f3e-594f-4416-d352-5fe2f350e38b: Since your last tadpole was destroyed, this one must be implanted.
Lines.a274ce84-dd3e-ea43-1ae4-b13bdcd39dcb: Your discomfort is natural. Though I must say - I find your illithid features as beautiful as your old draconic ones... if not more so.
Lines.19b0fc6f-dc59-b4fc-4f70-e9a278c5883d: I will not make Avernus more dangerous than it already is. I will not destroy you.
Lines.94114a23-5ab1-f392-7dd4-6ac610455bf8: As an illithid, my mind is more powerful than yours. Its design is to dominate you.
Lines.b548bfed-be1e-61a3-c8d6-b3143df5efc3: Since that is taken care of... we should turn to business.
Lines.90fe8f4c-d8f7-82fc-4e06-06a30697917b: I'm pleased to hear that, dear. I look forward to our future together.
Lines.8420d099-8402-4fdb-6bb2-5964f6bfc3af: Accidentally altering or subjugating your mind is a real possibility - from the passion of a joining to the simplicity of my presence, you will be in danger.
Lines.7b1959b5-51e3-7d0a-2db5-2e4f6f281262: Together, we have already accomplished more than I ever dared dream of. With our shackles broken, nothing will stand in our way.
Lines.e5221fa8-85ef-9144-91ae-00e7a41c570a: And I must say... sharing a mindspace with you is a privilege. In the centuries since my transformation, you are the one who has made my heart shine brightest.
Lines.1dcc85ae-122a-123c-58e2-17eb1cdcce51: I suppose it's worth trying, at least...
Lines.77397ada-2c81-3f7e-1d8f-157f070c9430: I haven't known such peaceful sleep for a long time - and I greatly enjoyed sharing it with you.
Lines.b7611519-76f4-2765-5305-fb109fa886fe: It's over. We are free. And with Orpheus's power, we never need fear enslavement again.
Lines.91aaa01f-2639-3c46-e6be-c6f6be805f29: You have given me a third beginning. I am infinitely grateful.
Lines.7052adca-1945-4733-711f-42dcf4ca5829: Of course. There is a certain... levity to intellect devourers. One that is surprisingly infectious.
Lines.6cdd61ef-ac3b-6b7b-789b-ebc880c90d28: Once we are done here, a meal should be easy to find - and I will make sure it's a satisfying one.
Lines.69fec8ae-a6b2-e331-efd4-cfe6686e652f: Very well. What will you do now?
Lines.6910e461-d361-326a-c832-962e3bc44229: Do not feel guilty about your diet. It is who you are - and you are glorious.
Lines.68094b05-c59c-c614-c168-46ddf30871e0: This is something to fear, not be excited by. I could dissolve your will and leave you a thoughtless husk.
Lines.66ec0526-fd63-1ac7-188c-f8a48ddbe9bf: You are too important to me to risk destroying. I'm sorry, but...
Lines.8f78615b-99c3-f4e4-7013-93d45ad76515: *The heat of your engine has never burned so bright. The inferno is here. It will not be contained.*
Lines.ff17d8b3-abb6-1e43-2b58-2bea29a8e985: You flatter me. You would willingly give your mind to me...
Lines.b8792963-6c46-e7b3-98ff-5fd4a79f7c76: You will be yourself! You could live!
Lines.bc857f1f-5065-abb3-8b78-17fc02ed9e68: Few survive encounters with our kind - at least with their minds intact. Those who do rarely get close enough to truly study us.
Lines.d77975d9-5087-cc68-ca06-ceedc33ee03e: Many of the "facts" about us are simply conjecture and hearsay. I look forward to rectifying any incorrect beliefs you may hold about me and yourself.
Lines.feaed25c-4a8a-08fe-7405-c17008040982: Now that you have had some time to think it over... what do you see in our future together?
Lines.fe60dbbf-a33a-75c6-d10c-d365888624d5: I see. A struggle between us would not be good for this city.
Lines.fe280020-9391-dbf0-e52a-edc8ccb4ab30: Even without our mental connection, I can feel your desperation... your heart has reached its end.
Lines.fe271906-dbb8-5a6a-ae32-0839bfca9825: It is a last resort. The decision to evolve should be made without bias; I feared telling you would influence your choice to return to Avernus.
Lines.fc520644-1990-8ed4-8232-beec4d8607c1: It's alright... your discomfort is natural. With time, you will see that form is meaningless... a lesson the rest of the githyanki have yet to learn.
Lines.f8c5a176-b70b-ba83-c2ec-cdc647e56673: If you are serious... I am able to accomodate such a desire.
Lines.84f23ea5-1827-d073-2135-37f69365ea64: I am discarding nothing. I am protecting you. You are more than capable of braving the Hells alone.
Lines.f4120db7-e23b-7a4b-b88f-e72064590455: Do not fear - we will see each other again. What will you do until then?
Lines.ee06e85a-ec0d-486d-9ea5-5539770f3c7f: Would you like to rebuild the Knights of the Shield with me? Together, we would do wonderful things.
Lines.b8ad32d0-72a4-bc9d-d600-139d8e6bd377: I am discarding nothing. I am protecting you, as I always have. What will you do until I see you again?
Lines.e94cd541-cfaa-c7f0-2837-8c26225815e4: Thank you, my dear. I appreciate your kindness.
Lines.d3554354-f9f7-7bff-fabf-1e041b97acb0: Our visit to the Steel Watch Foundry revealed that it was running on illithid technology. I detect similar signatures coming from your heart.
Lines.efe287fe-3dc5-bbe2-c0fc-c22eaaa5b107: Perhaps it is of illithid make. Perhaps if you evolved, it could be stabilized.
Lines.dbec33f8-e2f0-279f-854c-be9820758053: That you did so willingly is... astounding.
Lines.e4fe4ab2-7098-4279-2533-573cacf03bb3: I assure you, it is very possible. Piece by piece, your mind could become nothing more than an extension of my will.
Lines.d0f3bcc7-6e90-86ce-533d-cd68ef394d54: By the time either of us notices your erosion, the damage will be too extensive to repair.
Lines.cb6b0081-d5aa-bb9e-725d-90475e1aa051: I'm happy to hear that. Most githyanki resist change, even if it is for the better.
Lines.c5b72a85-d007-cbe8-d050-3c2fefbb8f41: That is quite the benign introduction. Don't worry - dreams contain shapes and colors we have no words for. They will fascinate you, with time.
Lines.c09f3ed2-7286-451c-4261-25ceeb437c03: Indeed. It would be unwise to stand in your way.
Lines.be60498c-85a0-7d93-59aa-59121e4111af: In time, you will find that your hunger is much easier to control then your old murderous instincts.
Lines.eaf5f37a-60cd-2d8a-8db4-0f9ce2ff456e: When you are ready, and after the tadpole has afixed itself, I will emulate the transformation command. Shall I insert the tadpole now?
Lines.638b18aa-d43c-214a-322e-a198f94286ff: Your ambition is a wonder to behold, my friend. Come - I would like to show you something.
Lines.654d6ba9-7f63-a936-7128-43b08ca65b73: It is strange, I admit. But we must realize that we are not inseparable. What will you do now?
Lines.5eefd58d-a9d9-1be8-ba42-cedef1a5ef84: I feared your sleep was not restful. I detected abnormal stress plaguing your mind, but I did not want to pry.
Lines.88a6d2da-3581-567f-6b96-ecceace4535d: For what it's worth... my own transformation still haunts me. The... physicality of it stays with you.
Lines.2d5bc24b-55dd-578f-e583-f61ca1e60cfe: Very well. Though I fear alone you will be far easier prey for Vlaakith than you would be under the protection of the Knights.
Lines.c2de2cf2-566c-7e32-9f94-40775b8c7fc7: Everyone's ceremorphosis is different. You simply need time to develop.
Lines.2a0b0586-a1c7-a4ce-e6d1-eecb9c728be9: There is nothing wrong with your body - you are beautiful.
Lines.28017c53-4927-897d-b4cc-a578468ce422: I'm sorry... the thought of losing you was more powerful than I anticipated.
Lines.2746089b-d4ea-cc63-6d55-04c65af525fa: Humanoid society is ignorant to illithid culture's artistic richness. There are numerous instruments tailored to your new form.
Lines.fd5ca9cd-6f3a-f623-83cc-5657edabc023: If you'd like, we can search for new outlets for your bardic talents. I will not see your passions lost.
Lines.269dae92-639e-4040-d71b-b706c7ce6bcb: *A tidal wave of the Emperor's relief drowns your consciousness.*
Lines.40536f24-9647-62d7-52ef-4bf4d177fb16: I understand. I will continue to look after this should evolution tempt you.
Lines.268d120c-1b23-2842-cdee-4f724b02ecea: However, this brings us back to our problem of differing forms.
Lines.25023457-0ce2-26c2-8b5a-08a435db41ac: I am happy to feel you as well.
Lines.21b423ca-0301-236d-aab4-f6e14ef433ad: Very well. The Knights are at your disposal should you require them.
Lines.1ea30488-51fe-d3f7-beb1-22ac94500d22: That... is quite the challenge. And an enticing one.
Lines.da2f53fc-fde0-1293-ab05-afaacd0390cf: I would enjoy building a sanctuary for those like us. Renegade illithids are scorned by all - we deserve a place where we can be ourselves.
Lines.dbba7cf4-5e5f-4ffe-7e5f-501339d8d66e: I have already created one city. Now, I will forge another - with you by my side.
Lines.2d89073e-696f-43aa-1de8-15deaf495ddb: The decision to evolve is life-altering. It should be made without bias; I feared telling you would influence your choice.
Lines.33297aab-3419-7738-3d35-a31eebb71236: But... we must discuss our continued partnership.
Lines.1adfb0bb-9efa-16e7-07a4-7defb6eca566: Are you truly accepting of this difference?
Lines.c08817fa-c559-fd4a-e7e5-3d724dd0a770: I'm sorry, Karlach. The risk is simply too great. You are more than capable of braving the Hells alone.
Lines.0d51ec4d-d297-d6d8-8417-0e95b272ecf2: I enjoy your faith in our bond, but I cannot allow you to remain in it without informing you of the risks.
Lines.0c9bdc13-0b62-1383-73bc-201f9b44347e: To work then, my friend. Come - I would like to show you something.
Lines.0c12abe0-6b6f-da2e-00ca-2b3196da6985: Indeed. They will be valuable allies, and service to the Knights will give them purpose.
Lines.fb7a1e55-9892-527f-f6ee-2b5f359d44b8: Most likely fled to the sewers. We should find them quickly - they are sure to be confused, desperate... and hungry.
Lines.065b7e07-165f-3505-3610-6e1d361c42f8: I... I respect your decision. I will stay by your side until the end.
Lines.05bfdeac-e23d-d7e2-1454-d310833f6bee: All of my close relationships with humanoids have ended in tragedy. There is no reason to believe ours will be any different.
Lines.57bceff1-1bb1-e97a-4c94-7d741ef6ec52: I have avoided adventure since my transformation. I believed I had lost all interest in it.
Lines.fac98ae9-58a4-e8b3-cbc2-b46b6fd4a9db: But... I was wrong. My love of the unknown never faded. Instead, it was missing one essential component.
Lines.04b08838-3131-bab7-2bb1-aee7b166b785: Now that I have you, my dear, I am ready to answer exploration's call once more.
Lines.667a7263-a33f-00e1-b2b0-2c97a3bd7ebe: Wherever we go, whatever we do - experiencing it with you will be the greatest honor of my life.
Lines.dd84240e-a208-88e8-95dd-ff0e283787b9: Know that you do not face the challenges ahead alone. I will provide whatever assistance you require.
Lines.1ab12a1c-5d89-4c7c-fcca-5de97e1b460a: After everything you have done for me, it is the least I can do for you.
Lines.d9835bbe-83da-4295-cb35-f3159de1dc61: With that said... we should turn to business.
Lines.2d9ee340-4006-6bc4-2315-d6e4ca4f1506: Yes... unfortunately, such cases are seldom documented. Our peoples do not traditionally interact in mutually beneficial settings.
Lines.6930d0c4-4ae1-2f5a-cbea-b6390ccaba73: Should we remain together, we will be alone in navigating the complexities of a relationship between a humanoid and an aberration.
Lines.2d83380f-ab5c-8899-7166-5922657e426e: I will stay by your side until the end.
Lines.b7182feb-3572-7227-b986-24a54cf467e2: You have a new body to care for, one with radically different needs and desires than before.
Lines.5b3fdbb8-30bf-46d9-6761-7faf3f386165: I know how difficult becoming illithid is.
Lines.5acfad83-52d2-67be-87e0-63c137100092: Remember: the path you are about to walk cannot be retread. You will be illithid for the rest of your life.
Lines.88a35f80-a431-241b-d2d6-82b37ccde4c3: Alright. Please calm yourself... don't stress your engine.
Lines.564b74aa-5f5b-6c11-ec91-271f3d73f86f: I admire your confidence in us. Let us hope then that our bond will remain unsullied by accident.
Lines.53543d34-49a6-be9a-9328-3f5066ca334c: Very well. Please remember though - appearance does not make one a monster.
Lines.9b9489a3-b607-6530-c3e1-5c1802f1db1c: When we find a way to fix your heart, we will return to this world together. I will not allow you to be trapped in the Hells for the rest of your life.
Lines.c7563a30-6a04-7c65-1538-e2c44720d13f: Do not fear. I am well accustomed to the limits of moral feeding.
Lines.4c619328-340a-7822-380f-0bcf31b470ae: Besides, your body no longer requires frequent sustenance. We will have time to select our meals judiciously.
Lines.4c4a2696-92f8-bb4e-ee8f-466e34313272: I'm glad you are taking to your new form well.
Lines.4b48d838-20f5-4145-049b-14aa49e0fe95: Their union did reassure me. However, I cannot help but wonder if Omeluum remains by Blurg's side without regard for his safety.
Lines.48ffd545-0c20-f448-328c-6537b3533f4e: I understand, but I can't say I'm not disappointed. I greatly enjoyed our time together. Where will you go?
Lines.2dc9a58f-b877-82ea-e2c9-c0a0a5968d75: Your discomfort is natural. Though remember: they are not illithid, and thus are in no position to judge you.
Lines.79a3147d-f0fd-cf37-9e0d-303621334ae5: I believe it is ready. Open your mind to me - I will dull the pain as much as I am able.
Lines.47a52aed-8e9a-fa08-0d12-7402799d793c: Understood. There is still room to work together, though. Our combined power would greatly benefit the city.
Lines.46e8be01-7ecc-1c57-3ce9-c20c330f3842: It is. Even now, I have yet to tire of its wonder.
Lines.539ea81c-6d11-67cc-e1d2-cf0b934c653a: Unfortunately, there are no remaining means within our reach to spur your evolution.
Lines.4454ff2c-652a-c1ca-d1ff-dfbf82863cfa: All tadpoles here in the city were destroyed when the brain died, and it is unlikely that the cultists left any in Moonrise.
Lines.3c957c66-9ed6-9e97-485c-5124c11dd6aa: I woulddn't do so intentionally, but illithids have been known to passively influence those around them.
Lines.33ebfb6d-27d0-d304-fe0a-4da8313cb3d1: Sorry... I didn't mean to overwhelm you. I'm... happy.
Lines.3a1ce03b-3e47-4557-71fe-7ed5d05d7777: Now that we are alone, and the fires of battle have cooled...
Lines.39d66987-db8e-f7b8-96f9-e2003d1076fc: The Steel Watchers saw you as one of their own... and they were made of illithid technology.
Lines.2ebd7a64-7e11-8e98-84c7-50d17c8d3df4: Perhaps your heart is of a similar structure. Perhaps if it were housed in an illithid body, it would be stabilized.
Lines.96b38ba2-4900-b856-ad62-28a6ced8b34a: I will see you off. Remember - this is not goodbye. We will see each other again.
Lines.7374e742-0116-2d81-cadb-0ce769bee741: Karlach... I have never known kindness as strong as yours. It will be my honor to safeguard your memories for as long as I live.
Lines.b6a13b34-8933-c327-8c3d-7f5103feb728: Turn around. I will make this as fast as I can.
Lines.c8631244-2471-f9b8-daee-4029199a4ade: Well, girl... you did it. The city's safe, my friends are safe...
Lines.1bf14fb2-3417-c244-ab70-057bba9f78cc: And now... I can make sure my little squiddie will be okay too.
Lines.ebf24648-cc80-3c1c-5324-ddd7aede2d8b: I will miss you. The memories we created rank among my most prized possessions.
Lines.c225f3dc-8d63-c7c3-6755-6c262135d39e: If you would ever like to visit... do not hesitate to come find me. You are welcome here.
Lines.0d522b3f-d02e-2846-b90b-9bbdf15b0ef3: Goodbye, my friend. I wish you great fortune in your newfound freedom.
